sub_topic: Prove that every group of order 18 is isomorphic to either the cyclic group C18, the non-abelian group of order 18, or the direct product of a cyclic group of order 3 and a group of order 6.
message_1: What is the structure of a group of order 18 and how can it be determined if it is isomorphic to one of the following: cyclic group C18, non-abelian group of order 18, or the direct product of a cyclic group of order 3 and a group of order 6?
